<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_data_broker_transform"><sys_ux_data_broker_transform action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><acl_failure_result/><api_name>x_708650_pfm.StringUtils</api_name><description/><mutates_server_data>false</mutates_server_data><name>StringUtils</name><output_schema/><private>false</private><props>[

},{

  "mandatory": false,
  "defaultValue": ""
}
]</props><required_translations/><schema_version>1.0.0</schema_version><script><![CDATA[function transform(input) {
    var prepend = input.prepend || '';
    var append = input.append || '';
	var string = input.string || '...';
	
    return prepend + string + append;
}
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-06-03 17:29:28</sys_created_on><sys_id>1b6f6fa6f4f741106e539ecf184a541b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>StringUtils</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PFM" source="x_708650_pfm">756d8d432f83301036b3d6c6f699b681</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PFM">756d8d432f83301036b3d6c6f699b681</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform_1b6f6fa6f4f741106e539ecf184a541b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-06-03 17:29:28</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_data_broker_transform></record_update>
